name: Assassin's Creed Syndicate: Jack the Ripper
name_original: Assassin's Creed Syndicate: Jack the Ripper
description:
Assassin's Creed Syndicate: Jack the Ripper is an action game developed by Ubisoft Quebec. It came out on 15-12-2015. Ubisoft Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Assassin's Creed Syndicate: Jack the Ripper is available on PC.
